citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
While protocol GAI-22-18 did list the procedures needed for the study, it did not contain a complete description of how
each procedure would be conducted and how invasive it would be for the animals. Without this information, the IACUC
cannot assess how the animals will be used and cared for and therefore cannot make an informed decision in approving
the protocol. A proposal to conduct an activity involving animals must contain a complete description of the proposed use
of the animals to allow for proper IACUC review and approval. Correct by December 8, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(e)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
While protocol GAI-22-18 did list the procedures needed for the study, it did not contain a complete description of how 
each procedure would be conducted and how invasive it would be for the animals. Without this information, the IACUC 
cannot assess how the animals will be used and cared for and therefore cannot make an informed decision in approving 
the protocol. A proposal to conduct an activity involving animals must contain a complete description of the proposed use 
of the animals to allow for proper IACUC review and approval. Correct by December 8, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
